results.content: Excellent. I was not an absolute beginner, and those that are may find themselves having to repeat material on occasion. In addition, the production value could be polished up at some points, but these are minor issues. This is a very good introductory course to get you up and rolling, and it will give you an end product you could continue to build on. Highly recommended.

results.content: I never learnt web developing before, but in the end of the course I could make a simple, basic website, so I thing it was a perfect course for me. When I would ask something Laurence (the instructor) answered it for me very fast, so I think it is a perfect course. And last but not least, he speaks a good english so it didn't hurt my ears when he speaks (like in some indian instructors).

response.content: Thank you for the amazing feedback and review

results.content:
It was, given there are several alternatives. I like the style of delivering large numbers of short sessions, it makes it much easier to skip over the parts I already have good knowledge of. Also not so daunting if I find the knowledge isn't as good as I thought it was! 
I'll probably need to replay some of the sections on floats; delivery was rather fast and vocally monotonous, which meant my attention wandered. This would have been better presented in a "follow-me" format and more slowly, in my view, given the concept of floats contradicts the usual way that styling and the flow of page output works.

response.content: Thank you for your wonderful feedback and review - glad you are enjoying the course let me know if you have any questions in the Q&A - Best wishes :)
response.content_html: Thank you for your wonderful feedback and review - glad you are enjoying the course let me know if you have any questions in the Q&A - Best wishes :)

results.content:
I recently got back to reviewing the course. The content is good,  but all of a sudden I started seeing blurred instructions on and off, I don't know if he is, accidentally, knocking the camera out of focus or what. Please attend to this problem, it is so frustrating and if it doesn't zoom back in, then it is im possible. I would surely like to finish this course with 5 star rating, Thank you! 

P.S. It might be related to my 8nternet speed. This started around subsection 26 to 36 where I stopped.

response.content: All the videos are recorded in the same quality, please adjust the Udemy player to ensure you are at highest resolution.  If automatic it adjusts to your internet connection.  1080 all videos upon upload.
response.content_html: All the videos are recorded in the same quality, please adjust the Udemy player to ensure you are at highest resolution. If automatic it adjusts to your internet connection. 1080 all videos upon upload.
